name: codemirror-lint-eslint
description: [codemirror-lint-eslint](https://github.com/angelozerr/codemirror-lint-eslint) provides the [eslint-lint.js](https://github.com/angelozerr/codemirror-lint-eslint/blob/master/eslint-lint.js) which is a [CodeMirror addon](http://codemirror.net/doc/manual.html#addons)  to use [CodeMirror Lint](http://codemirror.net/addon/lint/lint.js) with [ESLint](https://github.com/eslint/eslint).
author: Frankie Bagnardi <f.bagnardi@gmail.com>
